summary: Removes steaming effect from ash piles. No more nasty smell from your victims!
descriptionHtml:
Hate nasty smell from what left of your enemies? Not a problem! Because now it is gone! With new \"No Steaming Ash Piles\" mod! No steaming - No smell!

This mod is part of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32775]Legendary Dawnbreaker[/url]

PLEASE ENDORSE if you like it! :)

Original ash piles with blue steaming effect were completely not good for me. So after searching on Google and obviously Nexus and not founding such mod decided to make one myself.

Great along with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1838]Ash Pile Retex[/url]
You can use \"no glow\" version to get rid of both steaming and glowing.

Note: Screenshots made with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1838]Ash Pile Retex[/url] mod. It is essential to get really good look of ash piles.
author: mluppov
